Balu Kaimu:
Wear over the silver armor and grab Gazkh! (The blue color passes through the head with an ax, and clearly shows the emblem of print.)
Printing, tells me that warriors Today Elrokian triumph over vicious creature, Sailren.
Mother Shillen!
Be with us always, give us the courage to fulfill the sacred duties which you entrust to us.
Sunrise and loud Warsong narrate the end of the great great battle.
The writing on the stone again flickered, and then completely disappear and you hear the melody ...
